file.name: facet-string-pattern-invalid.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: OpenAPI Test
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:9999/v2
paths:
  /ping:
    post:
      summary: test
      description: test it
      operationId: pingOp
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SomeObj'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content: {}
components:
  schemas:
    SomeObj:
      type: string
      pattern: ^([\u30a0-\u30ff]+)
      example: holaキンギョ

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/ping": post: requestBody: contents: media: "application/json": generate schema: string validator: pattern: error parsing regexp: invalid escape sequence: `\u`
